label: Anime ID
desc: Anime Planet ID of the anime. (e.g. 1).

label: Anime Name
desc: full name of the anime. (e.g. FLCL)

label: Alternate Name
desc: another way to call the anime. (e.g. Furi Kuri)

label: Average Score
desc: average score of the anime given from all users in Anime Planet database. (e.g. 8.78)

label: Score Count
desc: number of users who give a score to the anime. (e.g. 1241)

label: Tags
desc: comma separated list of tags for this anime. (e.g. Comedy, Mecha, Sci Fi, Outer Space, Original Work)

label: Content Warnings
desc: comma separated list of content warning tags. (e.g. Explicit Violence, Mature Themes, Nudity)

label: Type
desc: TV, movie, OVA, etc. (e.g. TV).

label: Chapter Count
desc: number of chapters. (e.g. 26)

label: Finished
desc: True if the anime finished when I did the data scraping. False is the anime is on going in that moment.

label: Duration
desc: duration of the anime in minutes (e.g 60)

label: Start Year
desc: year when the anime start the transmission. (e.g. 2016)

label: End Year
desc: year when the anime finish the transmission. (e.g. 2017)

label: Release Season
desc: season and year of release (e.g. Fall 2000)

label: Studios
desc: comma separated list of studios (e.g. Sunrise)

label: Synopsis
desc: synopsis of the anime

label: Anime URL
desc: url to the main page of anime in Anime Planet (e.g. https://www.anime-planet.com/anime/vandread)

label: Recommended Anime ID
desc: Anime Planet ID of the recommended anime. (e.g. 1).

label: Recommendation Agreement
desc: number of users that was agreed with the recommendation.

label: User ID
desc: non identifiable randomly generated user id.

label: Anime ID
desc: Anime-planet ID of the anime.

label: User Score
desc: score between 1 to 5 given by the user in scale of 0.5. 0 if the user didn't assign a score.

label: State ID
desc: state ID from this anime in the anime list of this user.

label: Episodes Watched
desc: numbers of episodes watched by the user.

label: Rated Anime ID
desc: Anime-planet ID of the anime that this user has rated.

label: User Rating
desc: rating that this user has assigned.

label: Status ID
desc: ID of the status

label: Status Description
desc: description of the status
